籤詩版本二:
Me ka ʻole o ka manaʻo, ʻaʻohe ʻohana.
Inā noiʻoe i kou lokomaikaʻi, ponoʻoe e hiki ke hana, akā i ka hopena eʻikeʻoe ua pilikia nā mea a pau.
詩意:
ʻO kēia hexagram he hōʻailona ia o kahi paʻa i ka Dao o kahi kanaka lapuwale.
E noho conservative i nā mea a pau a kali i ka manawa.
解曰: Mai ʻōlelo i ka pono a i ʻole ka hewa. Pono e akahele. Puuwai akau. E pale aku i ka pōʻino.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hui ʻo Yin Jiao i kāna kumu
ʻO Yin Jiao ke keiki a ke Aliʻi Zhou o ka mōʻī Shang, a ua hoʻomana ʻo ia iā Guang Chengzi ma ke ʻano he kumu. ʻEkolu makahiki ma hope mai, ua aʻo ʻo ia i ke kilokilo, a i kona iho ʻana mai ka mauna mai, ua hoʻohiki ʻo ia iā Guangchengzi ʻaʻole ʻo ia e kōkua i ka Mōʻī Zhou e hana i nā mea ʻino a e ʻimi i ka puʻuhonua me ka Mōʻī Wen.
Ma ke ala, ua hoʻoikaika ʻia ʻo ia e hoʻi i ka home e kōkua i ka Mōʻī Zhou. Hele ka haku e hoohuli iaia, a hakaka ka haku a me ka haumana. Ma hope mai, ua paʻa ʻo Jiang Ziya lāua ʻo Taoist Ran Deng iā Yin Jiao ma waena o nā mauna ʻelua a ua kī ʻia e Guang Chengzi a make. I ka pane ana i ka hoohiki ana (Yin Jiao) hoohiki.
聖意: Ua pilikia au ma ka home, pilikia au, noi au i ke kālā, paʻakikī ke kūʻai aku, paʻakikī ke mare, pule au i ka pōmaikaʻi, keʻakeʻa nei nā kānaka i ka mahina ʻai, nui nā enuhe kilika, nui nā holoholona, ​​nui na poino, ke imi nei au i kanaka, pilikia au, pilikia au, pilikia au, pilikia au, pilikia au, pilikia au, pilikia au, i ka pilikia.
古人: E hui ana me kekahi kumu ma Yinjiao
